file_content.text: We couldn't have held out much longer alone.
I should have known Vaylin would attack Odessen. Just like Voss, you gave us shelter... and now you're paying the price.
This isn't your fault. Vaylin hates me just as much as she hates you.
Don't blame yourself.
My daughter is... broken. I see that now.
We will not let Odessen fall to her.
Walkers coming our way. Too many.
Whoo-eee! Bet you're glad we installed those upgrades now.
Nice work. Now show me what those guns can do against Vaylin's fleet.
I knew you'd come through.
Roger that.
The Gravestone alone won't turn this battle. My sister is unleashing the full fury of the Eternal Empire on Odessen.
Conquest isn't enough. She seeks to annihilate us. For her, this is personal.
She attacked my people. My followers. My friends. It doesn't get any more personal.
It's personal for me, too.
I'm on the enemy flank. Joined up with Sana-Rae. But we could use a little more firepower.
Lana, help Theron. I'm heading to the front lines. Vaylin needs to know exactly where to find me.
You won't have to face her alone. Arcann and I will join you.
Don't do anything foolish when she shows up. She's stronger than you now.
Don't underestimate her.
Together we can defeat her. I believe in the Alliance. I believe in you.
As do I.
My daughter must be stopped, at any cost.
Thanks for joining the party. Guess I sent out more invitations than I could handle.
Keeping you alive is becoming a full time job.
I'm sick of saving you.
Better get ready to put in some overtime then.
If you hadn't been here, the Gravestone would already be lost.
I should be thanking you.
Then we both earned a pat on the back.
Next time, let me see the guest list.
You call this a party?
Yeah, I have terrible taste in friends... present company excluded.
If you're planning something for our anniversary, let someone else organize it.
[Flirt] You call this a party?
Don't worry. That party will be much more intimate.
I helped you because I needed allies to stand against Vaylin.
Time to earn your keep.
We've chosen to stand with you, Outlander.
Attacking Odessen is the last mistake she'll ever make.
Vaylin will pay for this!
You're right. My daughter brought this on herself.
Ha! See that? Thanks to me, the Gravestone's better than ever.
Stop crowing and go help the fleet.
What do you want, a medal?
If the Eternal Fleet thought the Gravestone was trouble before, they're in for a nasty surprise.
They won't know what hit them!
My pleasure.
Give me some credit. Already on the way.
Where do you think I'm headed?
We're still badly outnumbered. Let me see if I can change that.
They still have the edge in numbers, but at least now we have a fighting chance.
The Gravestone alone won't be enough to turn the battle.
Vaylin's gunning for you personally, Commander. Maybe if you show up, it'll draw her down to the surface.
If she dares to come to the surface, I'll make sure she's buried here.
And then I'll kill her.
If I draw Vaylin's attention, it should take pressure off Bey'wan and the rest of our forces.
That'd help our troops.
Don't underestimate her. Vaylin's even stronger than the last time you faced her.
Theron and I will go with you. Hopefully we can distract her and get you close enough to end this.
Before she ends us.
And put a target right on your back. You'll need help to pull this off.
Vaylin's so desperate to kill me and Valkorion that she won't be able to resist.
We use her anger against her.
Using yourself as bait is a dangerous game. You're gonna need some help.
If we lure Vaylin down to the surface, I can end this battle with a single fight.
We use her anger against her.
Vaylin won't stop until everyone on Odessen is dead. I won't let that happen.
I need to protect my people.
I'm honored to have you fighting at my side.
That means a lot to me.
You can tag along, but when we run into Vaylin, don't forget that she's mine.
Okay, but I get to kill her.
We won't get in your way--but we won't stand idly by, either.
The honor is ours, Outlander. You've given us a chance to atone for our family's crimes. We won't waste it.
You need to fight Vaylin face-to-face. Lure her down to the surface. If she falls, the battle's over.
If you lure her down to the surface, you can confront her face-to-face.
That shouldn't be hard. My daughter is blinded by her bloodlust.
We've chosen to stand with you, Commander.
The honor is ours, Commander. You've given us a chance to atone for our family's crimes. We won't waste it.
Together we can defeat her. I believe in you.
